topic.title: Social networks
topic.body:
I think it would be great to set up a social network in Zeronet.
Could it be possible to set up a Diaspora, or a Friendica, or a Hubzilla/Redmatrix pod/hub in here?

1_1GG2zSSdoGqykuSqXrsnSo6JSgZ2UqMahu.body: I was wondering about that myself :-)

Also, I think it would be great if there could be a way for play to stream the videos, like popcorntime does :-)
But I suppose that's difficult in a browser, especially since we are using different browsers

3_1LPrQCYEyVA3Pz3gEVEf7Qc2z12QGNCSbd.body: It is a bitcoin wallet, right?

1_17ApQKugX1XH727gpAeD3mrRLjLxASdakd.body:
@ripper234
Yes, there are a lot of them. It's just that the ones I mentioned are in a "federation" with each other

> [ripper234](#comment_5_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL): Isn't Diaspora dead? I haven't heard of the others.
> I happen to know the CEO of Synereo, that's why I plugged in - I told him today he should take a SERIOUS look at ZeroNet.

Nope, I don't think it's dead, in fact it must be the most well known of most of the decentralized networks I have seen.
Synereo seems beautiful, I 'll check it out soon.
